articles.description: Kyle Washington had 17 points with eight rebounds and No. 6 Cincinnati remained undefeated in American Athletic Conference play, stretching its overall winning streak to 16 games with a 76-51 victory over short-handed SMU on Sunday.
articles.headline: No. 6 Cincinnati routs short-handed SMU for 16th win in row

images.caption: Mike Corey and Reid Gettys break down the dominant performance by Cincinnati in a win over SMU.
images.name: Cincinnati extends win streak to 16 games

articles.description: North Carolina will try to complete the trifecta when Notre Dame visits Monday night at the Smith Center.
articles.headline: No. 21 Tar Heels finish tough stretch against Notre Dame

articles.description: Mike Corey and Reid Gettys break down the dominant performance by Cincinnati in a win over SMU.
articles.headline: Cincinnati extends win streak to 16 games

images.caption: Mike Corey and Reid Gettys break down the dominant performance by Cincinnati in a win over SMU.
images.name: Cincinnati extends win streak to 16 games

articles.description: Kyle Washington goes up for a dunk, but he throws it at the rim and the ball still manages to fall.
articles.headline: Bearcats get the definition of a friendly roll

images.caption: Kyle Washington goes up for a dunk, but he throws it at the rim and the ball still manages to fall.
images.name: Kyle Washington goes up for a dunk, but he throws it at the rim and the ball still manages to fall.

articles.description: Akwasi Yeboah scored with 44 seconds left for the lead and Tyrell Sturdivant added three free throws in Stony Brook's 64-61 victory over Maine on Sunday.
articles.headline: Stony Brook continues dominance of Maine with 64-61 win

articles.description: Joe Cremo scored 21 points, Travis Charles had 14 and nine rebounds and Albany beat Harford 69-63 on Sunday.
articles.headline: Albany keeps Hartford at bay with 69-63 win behind Cremo
